nodes.text: Manchucho was a male Aleena from the planet Aleen who served as the King of Aleen during the Clone Wars.

During the Clone Wars, King Manchucho welcomed the clone trooper squad Wolfpack and asked the Grand Army for relief efforts after the groundquakes ravaged his planet. Commander Wolffe didn't understand Manchucho's language, so the protocol droid C-3PO was used to translate.

The King of Aleen was fair and intelligent, wanting a peaceful coexistence with the beings that lived beneath the surface of Aleen during the groundquakes. He wore an elaborate golden headdress and had a staff.
Manchucho was an ally of the Republic, but was primarily focused on the governing of Aleen.
